title: Update pricing copy: Free includes 10 invoices/month and Pro is ₹299 with unlimited invoices

requirements.text: Update all user-facing pricing/plan copy to state that the Free plan includes **10 invoices per month** (replace any existing '5 invoices per month' references). Ensure this is reflected consistently on the Pricing page and Landing page.

quotes: amend the pricing to include 10 invoices per month under free plan and pro plan of Rs 299 with unlimited invoices

acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx`, the Free plan feature list shows '10 invoices per month' instead of '5 invoices per month'.
On `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx`, any mentions of '5 invoices per month' (features section and pricing preview section) are updated to '10 invoices per month'.
No remaining UI text in these pages claims the Free plan is limited to 5 invoices/month.

requirements.text: Update any dashboard plan-limit messaging that references the Free plan monthly invoice limit so it aligns with **10 invoices per month**.

quotes: amend the pricing to include 10 invoices per month under free plan and pro plan of Rs 299 with unlimited invoices

acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx`, the Free plan usage string '(3/5 invoices used this month)' is updated so the denominator reflects a 10-invoice/month Free plan (e.g., '(3/10 invoices used this month)' if keeping the same placeholder usage count).
No other dashboard text contradicts the '10 invoices/month' Free plan limit.

requirements.text: Confirm Pro plan pricing and invoice entitlement are consistent across the app: **₹299/month** and **Unlimited invoices** wherever Pro plan pricing/features are displayed.

quotes: pro plan of Rs 299 with unlimited invoices

acceptanceCriteria: On `frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx`, Pro plan continues to display ₹299/month and 'Unlimited invoices'.
On `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx`, Pro plan continues to display ₹299/month and 'Unlimited invoices'.
No user-facing Pro plan copy in these pages contradicts 'Unlimited invoices' or the ₹299/month price.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.

Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything in `frontend/src/components/ui`.
nonGoals: Implementing or enforcing invoice quota limits in backend/business logic (this change request is for pricing/plan copy consistency only).
Changing Stripe configuration, product/catalog management, or checkout flow behavior beyond reflecting the stated ₹299/month Pro pricing already present.
